content: this crochet pattern for alpine socks makes chic and stylish socks available in five sizes this is a fun pattern to make a pair for the whole family we use a strategic kind of increasing to make the heel fingering/size 1 yarn 1 stroll effects used -approx 365 440 500 600 640 yards total crochet hook in size 4mm 2 stitch markers 3 this is a fun pattern with a video tutorial 1 https //tidd ly/45yq5bs 2 https //tidd ly/4kzqz7o 3 https //tidd ly/4nsihxb
